message.body: Hey! I just messaged you with more detail but my plan today is retail therapy bc I need dresses for events (I know you did that yesterday though so feel free to come with or we can do dinner) :)

Dinner sounds great! Although the one issue is that I'm going to be sleeping over at Simmons tonight because I'm babysitting in Brookline 5-6:30ish and have an appointment in Cambridge the next morning. So if you wanted to come to the Fenway area for dinner tonight around 7 that would work, or we could make plans for tmrw if you don't feel like trekking into Boston tonight!
Are you free tomorrow during the day?
Yes! I'm free around 1:30 until 5ish. Want to grab a late lunch?
Hooray!!! So excited to see you!
Would you be able to pick me up from my Needham place tmrw to go to lunch? Don't have a car available to me.
Sure! I have my car so that's no problem

Hey, I'm excited to see you today! So I will be heading back to Needham from Harvard square around 11:50, so I should be home by 1:30 but I'll keep you posted if I'm running late (sometimes the T is obnoxious)
